name: Anya Forger
story: Anya is a bright child with dreams of world peace. She needs support to complete her education.

name: Iqra Khan
story: Iqra is passionate about robotics and wants to represent India in international competitions.

name: Raj Mehta
story: Raj is a talented painter looking to fund his exhibition and apply to an art school abroad.

name: Laxmi Kumari
story: Laxmi wants to continue her basic education and needs help covering tuition and books.

name: Arjun Verma
story: Arjun is a young athlete training for the nationals in boxing and needs financial support.
